original_text: So David, the leaders of Israel and the army officers went to fetch the Lord's Covenant Box from Obed-Edom's house. They were very happy as they took it from there to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 이에 다윗과 이스라엘 장로들과 천부장들이 가서 여호와의 언약궤를 즐거이 메고 오벧에돔의 집에서 올라왔는데

sentences.original_text: So David, the leaders of Israel and the army officers went
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 다윗과 이스라엘 지도자들과 군대 장교들이 갔다

sentences.original_text: to fetch the Lord's Covenant Box from Obed-Edom's house
as they took it from there to Jerusalem
